author: CBS News
title: Watch live: New York Governor Cuomo gives coronavirus update
description: Cuomo said Wednesday the state is still "in the woods​" in its fight against the virus.
content: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo is expected to give an update Thursday on the state's response to the coronavirus pandemic. Cuomo said Wednesday the state is still "in the woods" in its fight against the virus and that New Yorkers will be required to wear face… [+519 chars]
